name: The story of the revolutionary watermelon that wanted to live free as a bird and learned how to escape
name_original: The story of the revolutionary watermelon that wanted to live free as a bird and learned how to escape
description:
🍉🍉  It's time to rise up for watermelons all over the world!  🍉🍉  This is just the beginning... “Sort of like if you replaced the protagonist in one of Playdead’s game’s with a watermelon; Limbo but for sentient produce.” Ethan Gach - Kotaku 🍉 GREAT UPDATE 🍉

Do you want to slap a 100% real watermelon? Now you can!

Build your own
Amazing Watermelon Controller!

Visit our project page on Fritzing, download the schematics and the code to program your favorite Arduino; then choose a good watermelon and stick tight the sensor to it, after that connect it to your computer via USB, start the game (Showcase Version), select the port where Arduino is connected and play. 

Revolutionary Watermelon Controller on Fritzing

Keep us updated and post about your own controllers, be creative and have fun #watermeloncontroller
